content.text:
# 2014 Multishow Brazilian Music Awards

| network     = Multishow
| ratings     =
| previous    = 2013
| main        = Multishow Brazilian Music Awards
| next        = 2015
}}
The 2014 Multishow Brazilian Music Awards () (or simply 2014 Multishow Awards) (Portuguese: Prêmio Multishow 2014) was held on 28 October 2014, at the HSBC Arena in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. Ivete Sangalo, Paulo Gustavo, Tatá Werneck and Didi Wagner hosted the ceremony.
Luan Santana received the most nominations with four. Santana, Thiaguinho and Banda do Mar received the most awards with two each.
Winners and nominees
Winners appear first and highlighted in bold.

The winners of the following categories were chosen by fan votes.
